quote: I was going to make him forget, too. He would forget every woman who came before me, every moment that I wasn’t a part of, every dream he had that didn’t include me. Starting now.
quote_letters: I WAS GOING TO MAKE HIM FORGET TOO HE WOULD FORGET EVERY WOMAN WHO CAME BEFORE ME EVERY MOMENT THAT I WASNT A PART OF EVERY DREAM HE HAD THAT DIDNT INCLUDE ME STARTING NOW
